WHITE WHALE REMOTE

1: PRESET 0
2: NEXT PRESET
3: HARD SYNC, CUT TO KNOB POS
4: CUT TO KNOB POS
5: PATTERN 0
6: QUEUED PATTERN TO KNOB POS
7: MUTE TRIGGERS
8: UNMUTE TRIGGERS

MUST CONNECT VIA CABLE

FOR KNOB SCRIPTS, TRY CHANGING
PARAM TO IN, FOR CV CONTROL!



#1
X 0

#2
X WRAP ADD X 1 0 7

#3
X RSH PARAM 10

#4
X RSH PARAM 10

#5

#6
X RSH PARAM 10

#7

#8

#M

#I

#P
